lead_paragraph: The federal grand jury investigating steroid use in sports today indicted a former cyclist, Tammy Thomas, for perjury and obstruction of justice, charging that she lied to another grand jury probing the Balco steroids case.
snippet: The federal grand jury investigating steroid use in sports today indicted a former cyclist, Tammy Thomas, for perjury and obstruction of justice, charging that she lied to another grand jury probing the Balco steroids case.
